mapper.select: SELECT SCH_NUM ,SCH_DATE ,S.DOC_NUM ,DOC_NAME ,( SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM medical_dept P WHERE D.DEPT_NUM=P.DEPT_NUM ) AS DEPT_NAME ,M.MEM_NUM ,MEM_NAME ,DETAIL ,SCH_STATUS FROM MEDICAL_SCHEDULE S,MEDICAL_DOCTOR D,MEDICAL_MEMBER M WHERE S.DOC_NUM=#{docNum} AND S.DOC_NUM=D.DOC_NUM AND S.MEM_NUM=M.MEM_NUM ORDER BY SCH_DATE ASC LIMIT #{pageVO.displayDataCnt} OFFSET #{pageVO.offset}

SELECT SCH_NUM ,SCH_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(SCH_TIME,'%H:%i') AS SCH_TIME ,D.DOC_NUM ,DOC_NAME ,( SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM medical_dept P WHERE D.DEPT_NUM=P.DEPT_NUM ) AS DEPT_NAME ,M.MEM_NUM ,MEM_NAME ,CONCAT( SUBSTRING(MEM_RRN, 1, 6), '-', REPEAT('*', LENGTH(MEM_RRN) - 6) ) AS MEM_RRN ,MEM_TEL ,DETAIL FROM MEDICAL_SCHEDULE S,MEDICAL_DOCTOR D,MEDICAL_MEMBER M WHERE SCH_NUM=#{schNum} AND S.DOC_NUM=D.DOC_NUM AND S.MEM_NUM=M.MEM_NUM;

SELECT SCH_NUM ,SCH_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(SCH_TIME,'%H:%i') AS SCH_TIME ,DOC_NAME ,( SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM medical_dept P WHERE D.DEPT_NUM=P.DEPT_NUM ) AS DEPT_NAME ,MEM_NAME ,SCH_STATUS FROM MEDICAL_SCHEDULE S,MEDICAL_DOCTOR D,MEDICAL_MEMBER M WHERE S.MEM_NUM=#{memNum} AND S.MEM_NUM=M.MEM_NUM AND S.DOC_NUM=D.DOC_NUM ORDER BY SCH_DATE ASC, SCH_TIME ASC LIMIT #{pageVO.displayDataCnt} OFFSET #{pageVO.offset}
SELECT DOC_NUM, DOC_NAME, D.DEPT_NUM , DEPT_NAME FROM medical_doctor D, medical_dept T WHERE D.DEPT_NUM = T.DEPT_NUM ORDER BY DOC_NUM
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM medical_schedule WHERE SCH_DATE < CURRENT_DATE()
